= Welcome to the Princeton MVPA Toolbox Wiki =

This wiki contains the latest documentation for the [http://www.csbmb.princeton.edu/mvpa/ Princeton MVPA Toolbox]. Please note the section header tabs at the top of the page.

If you're new to the toolbox, you will want to check out [Setup Setup] for installation instructions, and then look through [Tutorials Tutorials] to get started. The [Manual Manual] provides more detailed coverage on the toolbox for technical users.
